thread.section_title: Topcashback Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Topcashback | topcashback.com | 2 of 108
thread.title: Kim Mailhot

author: Kim Mailhot
title: Kim Mailhot
text: For the most part I get money back from topcashback, especially from the main retailers like jcpenney, kohls, priceline, hotwire. I have a difficult time getting the selection "just right" in order to get the amazon rebates and there have been a couple of times topcashback has been unable to get the retailed to give me money back (taxact and sears). For the most part, if you are going to buy something anyway you can always try going through topcashback first and maybe you will get extra $$ back.
